title: Old Books
description: Old books eCommerce website. A seller can add a product, the buyer can book and later pay and the admin can control the users and products

features.feature1: Users get dashboard access based on their role. Firebase authentication and JSON web token are used to control and prevent unauthorized access.
features.feature2: Node.js is used for the backend and MongoDB is for the data storage purpose. For the payment react stripe test mode is used.

title: Colors
description: A photography service-based website. Users can choose from different services. They can also add reviews and also check reviews from other clients.

features.feature1: A user can check different services and see details of a service. New service is also can be added and displayed in the service section.
features.feature2: If they add a review it is stored in MongoDB and later fetches data to show them in the review section.

title: IT Schools
description: An IT learning website. Courses are offered from different categories and people can choose from them.

features.feature1: Different courses are offered. Students can explore different courses, check the details of a course, and decide. It is a responsive website with react-bootstrap.
features.feature2: React icons, react hot toast and firebase authentication are implemented for a good user experience.
